title: LF Top Laner and Support for  Clash  (Sunday Only)
body:
As per title. (We already have ADC/Mid/Jg)

Ideally looking for someone around Platinum rank.

MUST HAVE MICROPHONE.

We are also interested in possibly making this 5 man team a more permanent thing (ie maybe do a flex game a few times a week), so bonus points if this interests you.

I will probably forget to check this post, so please add myself and our midlaner in game. Hopefully we will get a chance to play a game before clash!
Soccersupastar (me/adc)
KDVT (mid laner)

Thanks!
